constraints.name: monotonic_subarray_length
constraints.description: 数组的稳定性定义为最长严格单调递增或递减的连续子区间的长度
constraints.formal: stability(A) = max { len(S) | S is a strictly increasing or decreasing subarray of A }

constraints.name: merge_sequence_constraint
constraints.description: A 和 B 归并形成的新数组可以划分为两个不交叉子序列，且分别是 A 和 B 的排列
constraints.formal: A ∪ B = C, where C can be partitioned into two non-overlapping subsequences A' and B' such that A' is a permutation of A and B' is a permutation of B

constraints.name: min_stability_function
constraints.description: f(A, B) 表示 A 和 B 归并后形成的数组的最小稳定性
constraints.formal: f(A, B) = min { stability(C) | C is a valid merge of A and B }

constraints.name: distinct_elements
constraints.description: A 数组和 B 数组中所有整数两两不同，归并后的数组是 1 到 n+m 的一个排列
constraints.formal: A ∪ B is a permutation of {1, 2, ..., n+m}
